attributes.action: Stop the charges for day services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the planned charges for day services to be scrapped.
 
People who rely on the services for support outside of hospital and who will be unable or unwilling to pay £10 per session.
 
The psychiatric services will be deluged by people who have lost their ability to cope and centres will close due to lack of clients.
